Astro Legends: Lyra and Erion
Astro Legends è una divertente slot gratis sviluppata da Foxium e presente nei migliori casinò online dal 2018. Basata su un’avventura a tema Fantascienza mixata alla cultura degli anni Ottanta e con un originale layout esagonale, questa slot ti permette di ottenere combinazioni vincenti e bonus davvero generosi come il Sonis Respini. Riunito in un unico, ordinato pacchetto retrò funky, questa slot online offre un’entusiasmante esperienza di gioco che gli appassionati di questo genere apprezzeranno sicuramente.
Grafica e Caratteristiche di Gioco di Astro Legends
Come ti accennavo nell’introduzione, la prima cosa che noterai della slot Astro Legends di Foxium è il suo layout.  Il gioco presenta infatti un gameplay a 9 rulli di forma esagonale, una caratteristica che offre ai giocatori la possibilità di ottenere combinazioni vincenti in molti modi diversi. Inoltre, è presente una funzione di respin, che ti consente di migliorare le tue vincite esistenti e tentare di ottenere alcune ricompense stellari. I protagonisti Lyra ed Erion sono posizionati ai lati opposti dei rulli e aspettano un tuo clic per cominciare la loro battaglia a suon di musica e poteri extra terreni!
Come si gioca slot online Astro Legends?
Astro Legends è una slot online in stile cluster, il che significa che i giocatori ottengono combinazioni vincenti atterrando cinque o più simboli in un gruppo, a differenza delle slot tradizionali in cui le vincite vengono create quando tre o più simboli atterrano sulla stessa payline. I giocatori possono scommettere ovunque da 0,10 centesimi a 100,00 euro per slin, quindi non importa se sei un high roller o un player occasionale, sarai comunque in grado di divertirti mentre giochi a questa slot senza registrazione che ha un RTP (ritorno al giocatore) del 96,5%.  Per vincere, devi trovare 5 simboli in un gruppo e otterrai una combinazione vincente. Dal momento che il gioco non ha linee di pagamento tradizionali, puoi arrivare a realizzare fino a 22 combinazioni vincenti uguali, con la più generosa che vale 1000 volte la tua puntata totale.
Suggerimento → Per migliorare le tue probabilità di vincita su Astro Legends, è possibile aggiungere moltiplicatori jolly ai rulli. Appariranno solo negli spazi evidenziati in rosso e possono moltiplicare la tua vincita fino a 5 volte.
Come si attiva il Sonic Respin di Astro Legends?

Quando ottieni una vittoria, potresti essere in grado di attivare il Bonus Sonic Respin
Tutti i simboli vincenti vengono tenuti in posizione, mentre i rulli girano di nuovo
Se vengono aggiunti altri simboli a quel gruppo, anche questi si bloccheranno e verrà concesso un nuovo giro
Questo continuerà fino a quando non verranno aggiunti più simboli al gruppo vincente o tutti e 22 spazi non saranno riempiti con lo stesso simbolo.

L’importanza dei Moltiplicatori Jolly nel gioco Astro Legends
Astro Legends include preziosi moltiplicatori jolly, utili per accrescere le opportunità di vincita e portarti nel pianeta Terra generose ricompense. La comparsa di queste icone però è molto rara, infatti i moltiplicatori jolly si manifestano unicamente all’interno di tre caselle rosse, realizzate ad hoc per accoglierli. Il simbolo moltiplicatore jolly è in grado di sostituire qualsiasi icona e ciascuna vittoria che ne usa uno, vedrà la somma di partenza moltiplicata per un moltiplicatore casuale incluso tra 2 e 5 volte la giocata. Un altro aspetto che ho trovato intrigante, è che i valori di questo ambito moltiplicatore vengono addizionati se la combinazione vincente include un’icona moltiplicatore jolly.
Come funziona il Lyra Spirit Bonus?
Questo extra bonus ti consente di raccogliere punti man mano che ottieni simboli speciali sui rulli. Dopo aver raccolto 100 punti, si attiverà il Lyra Sprit Bonus, che è un round di 7 livelli. Durante questo round, scegli uno dei tre percorsi da far percorrere allo spirito di Lyra impersonato da un lupo e raccogli le gemme lungo la strada. Se il percorso è bloccato, il giocatore perderà una vita. Man mano che raccogli più gemme, guadagnerai premi sempre più grandi e migliori + un bonus 20x che viene applicato alla tua vincita se superi tutti i 7 livelli.
Pensieri conclusivi su Astro Legends
Ti divertirai sicuramente mentre fai girare i rulli sulla slot Astro Legends di Foxium. Il gioco offre una vasta gamma di occasioni di vincita, grazie al formato Cluster, e l’aspetto generale del gioco è davvero impressionante, quindi ti appassionerai fin dall’inizio. Non abbiamo mai visto una slot come Astro Legends, ed è sicuramente il tipo di gioco che devi provare se cerchi qualcosa di davvero cool!

Sì, puoi giocare gratuitamente ad Astro Legends di Foxium e quando preferisci sulla nostra piattaforma SlotJava. Non è necessario registrarsi a un casinò online ADM o effettuare un deposito, tutto avviene in modo molto fluido e in totale sicurezza.

Astro Legends: Lyra and Erion is a fun, sci-fi-themed free slot game developed by Foxium and available in the best online casinos since 2018. With a mix of 80s culture and an original hexagonal layout, this slot offers players the chance to win big with combinations and generous bonuses like the Sonic Respin. It's all packed into a neat, funky retro package that gives gamblers an exciting gaming experience they're sure to love.

Graphics and Gameplay Features of Astro Legends
As mentioned in the introduction, the first thing you'll notice about the Foxium's Astro Legends slot is its layout. The game features a hexagonal gameplay of 9 reels, giving players the chance to create winning combinations in many different ways. Additionally, there is a respin function that allows you to improve your existing winnings and try for some stellar rewards. The protagonists Lyra and Erion are positioned on opposite sides of the reels and await your clicks to start their battle with music and extraterrestrial powers!

How to Play Astro Legends Online Slot?
Astro Legends is an online cluster-style slot, which means that players get winning combinations by landing five or more symbols in a group, unlike traditional slots where wins are created when three or more symbols land on the same payline. Players can bet anywhere from 0.10 cents to 100.00 euros per spin, so whether you're a high roller or a casual player, you can still have fun while playing this registration-free slot with an RTP (return to player) of 96.5%. To win, you must find five symbols in a group and you will get a winning combination. Since the game doesn't have traditional paylines, you can get up to 22 equal winning combinations, with the most generous worth 1000 times your total bet.

Tip → To improve your chances further while playing Astro Legends, you can add wild multipliers to the reels. They will only appear in spaces highlighted in red and can multiply your winnings up to 5 times.

How to Trigger the Sonic Respin in Astro Legends?

When you get a win, you might be able to activate the Sonic Respin Bonus
All winning symbols are held in position while the reels spin again
If more symbols are added to that group, they will also lock in place and a new spin will be granted
This will continue until no more symbols are added to the winning group or all 22 spaces are filled with the same symbol.

The Importance of Wild Multipliers in Astro Legends
Astro Legends includes valuable wild multipliers, useful for increasing your chances of winning and bringing you generous rewards to planet Earth. However, the appearance of these icons is very rare, the wild multipliers only appear within three red boxes specially created to welcome them. The wild multiplier symbol can replace any icon and each win that uses one will see the starting sum multiplied by a random multiplier between 2 and 5 times the bet. Another intriguing aspect I found is that the values of this multiplier field are added up if the winning combination includes a wild multiplier icon.

How Does the Lyra Spirit Bonus Work?
This extra bonus enables you to earn points as you collect special symbols on the reels. After collecting 100 points, the Lyra Spirit Bonus will activate, which is a 7-level round. During this round, pick one of three paths to lead Lyra's spirit, embodied by a wolf, and collect gems along the way. If the path is blocked, the player loses a life. As you collect more gems, you earn bigger and better rewards + a 20x bonus applied to your win if you clear all 7 levels.

Final Thoughts on Astro Legends
You'll definitely have fun spinning the reels on Foxium's Astro Legends slot. The game offers a wide range of winning opportunities, thanks to the Cluster format, and the overall look of the game is really impressive, so you'll be hooked from the start. We've never seen a slot like Astro Legends, and it's definitely the type of game you should try if you're looking for something really cool!

Astro Legends: Lyra and Erion gameplay

Astro Legends features a hexagonal gameplay of 9 reels, giving players the chance to create winning combinations in many different ways. Additionally, there is a respin function that allows you to improve your existing winnings and try for some stellar rewards.

RTP

The RTP value of Astro Legends is 96.5%, making it one of the most attractive online slot games available to players.

Sonic Respin Bonus

During this round, pick one of three paths to lead Lyra's spirit, embodied by a wolf, and collect gems along the way. If the path is blocked, the player loses a life. As you collect more gems, you earn bigger and better rewards + a 20x bonus applied to your win if you clear all 7 levels.

Free play on SlotJava

        Review: Astro Legends: Lyra and Erion is a fun, sci-fi-themed free slot game developed by Foxium and available in the best online casinos since 2018. With a mix of 80s culture and an original hexagonal layout, this slot offers players the chance to win big with combinations and generous bonuses like the Sonic Respin. It's all packed into a neat, funky retro package that gives gamblers an exciting gaming experience they're sure to love.

Graphics and Gameplay Features of Astro Legends
As mentioned in the introduction, the first thing you'll notice about the Foxium's Astro Legends slot is its layout. The game features a hexagonal gameplay of 9 reels, giving players the chance to create winning combinations in many different ways. Additionally, there is a respin function that allows you to improve your existing winnings and try for some stellar rewards. The protagonists Lyra and Erion are positioned on opposite sides of the reels and await your clicks to start their battle with music and extraterrestrial powers!

How to Play Astro Legends Online Slot?
Astro Legends is an online cluster-style slot, which means that players get winning combinations by landing five or more symbols in a group, unlike traditional slots where wins are created when three or more symbols land on the same payline. Players can bet anywhere from 0.10 cents to 100.00 euros per spin, so whether you're a high roller or a casual player, you can still have fun while playing this registration-free slot with an RTP (return to player) of 96.5%. To win, you must find five symbols in a group and you will get a winning combination. Since the game doesn't have traditional paylines, you can get up to 22 equal winning combinations, with the most generous worth 1000 times your total bet.

Tip → To improve your chances further while playing Astro Legends, you can add wild multipliers to the reels. They will only appear in spaces highlighted in red and can multiply your winnings up to 5 times.

How to Trigger the Sonic Respin in Astro Legends?

When you get a win, you might be able to activate the Sonic Respin Bonus
All winning symbols are held in position while the reels spin again
If more symbols are added to that group, they will also lock in place and a new spin will be granted
This will continue until no more symbols are added to the winning group or all 22 spaces are filled with the same symbol.

The Importance of Wild Multipliers in Astro Legends
Astro Legends includes valuable wild multipliers, useful for increasing your chances of winning and bringing you generous rewards to planet Earth. However, the appearance of these icons is very rare, the wild multipliers only appear within three red boxes specially created to welcome them. The wild multiplier symbol can replace any icon and each win that uses one will see the starting sum multiplied by a random multiplier between 2 and 5 times the bet. Another intriguing aspect I found is that the values of this multiplier field are added up if the winning combination includes a wild multiplier icon.

How Does the Lyra Spirit Bonus Work?
This extra bonus enables you to earn points as you collect special symbols on the reels. After collecting 100 points, the Lyra Spirit Bonus will activate, which is a 7-level round. During this round, pick one of three paths to lead Lyra's spirit, embodied by a wolf, and collect gems along the way. If the path is blocked, the player loses a life. As you collect more gems, you earn bigger and better rewards + a 20x bonus applied to your win if you clear all 7 levels.

Final Thoughts on Astro Legends
You'll definitely have fun spinning the reels on Foxium's Astro Legends slot. The game offers a wide range of winning opportunities, thanks to the Cluster format, and the overall look of the game is really impressive, so you'll be hooked from the start. We've never seen a slot like Astro Legends, and it's definitely the type of game you should try if you're looking for something really cool!
